messages.messageBody:
Hi, everyone. let me introduce myself. My name is Asyraf. I'm from
Indonesia.
I join this group because I want to know more about samurai. I know
this group from www.samurai-archives.com. And I'm very happy after I
join this group. Hahahahahahahahaha...........

Ok, God Bless....

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory]Introduction
messages.msgSnippet: Hello All: My name is Raphael.  I do not read, speak, or otherwise comprehend Japanese, but I am enamoured of the Samurai Period . I can t say exaclty what
messages.messageBody:
Hello All:
My name is Raphael. I do not read, speak, or otherwise comprehend Japanese, but
I am enamoured of the "Samurai Period". I can't say exaclty what got me
interested in Feudal Japan, but I fed that love with the films of Kurosawa, the
Lone Wolf and Cub manga, and whatever else I could find.
An Asain history professor loaned me a book in College and I was wondering if
anyone recognizes it. It was basically the diary of a rapscallion Samurai in
the Edo period. He is constantly running out of money, luck, and friends. I
remember thinking that he was utterly charming on paper, but that I would't want
him as a friend. Does this sound familiar to anyone.

Thanks,
Raphael in T


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
